main event: A bright light was observed rapidly changing size and then accelerating at high speed in Spanish Morocco.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes, with visual and radar confirmation., The object initially appeared small like a star, then grew to a very large size., The light changed from a small point to a large object and back to a small point., The object had a white or yellow color and remained stationary for about 60 seconds before speeding off., The direction of flight was initially stationary before moving westward at high speed.
sighted object: a bright light that changed size
witness description: observed visually and on radar by military personnel
